name: Tamago Senshi
description:
How to play:

The player must collect all crystals, kill all enemies and make sure to put all eggs in the black hole (portal), in order to clear a stage.

If the character gets hit, she will turn into a ghost. In ghost mode she can no longer attack. So she needs to touch an egg and recover her physical (material) body. If no eggs are available, then that's the end.

Controls:

(keyboard)

Arrow keys -> move character

Z, X, C and V keys are used for shooting and running.

(Gamepad)

D-pad or left stick -> move character

A, B, X and Y buttons are used for shooting and running
